summary: A small fix for Skyrim Knights mod made by hideuscircus. This mod adds the Skyrim Knights to rightfull hold guards and soldiers.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Review of the mod by [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp5yetVqKAC3G0vPtrPObsQ]Nozi87[/url] check out his channel![/size]

[youtube]JixV5DEQPFI[/youtube]


This fix is for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28044/?]Skyrim Knights[/url] made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2130985/][b]hideouscircus[/b][/url] All rights reserved.  The hold guards now wear Skyrim Knights Armor instead of the vanilla guard armor. 

I've Also managed to make guards hold into the Noble Silversword, Stormcloak and stormcloak guards (Riften, Windhelm, Winterhold and Dawnstar) are able to use Noble Silver Greatsword

[u][size=6]Warning![/size]
[/u]
You need Skyrim Knigts installed before using this.

[b][u][size=4]Load this AFTER Skyrim Knights.ESP[/size][/u][/b]

PS. Hold Guards will now have a stronger armor and weapons. This will make guards around 40 - 60% stronger than earlier. I haven't really tested killing em since you can craft the components.

Those who use 1.4 and finds imperial soldiers/guards or stormcloak soldiers/guards not wearing the armor report them in comment section with location where you find them and I will look into it!.


[b]Update Notes[/b]
Version 1.4 : Added Gear To Imperial Soldiers 
 - Added Gear to Stormcloak Soldiers 
 - Added Gear to Imperial Guads (Riften, Windhelm, Dawnstar, Winterhold) 
 - Added Gear to Stormcloak Guards (Whiterun, Falkreath, Solitude, Morthal, Markarth) 

[size=2]V1.3 : Fixed remaining Whiterun guards.
[/size] - Added gear to Commander Caius
 - Added Gear to Chief Yamarz, Chief Barguk, Chief Mauhulakh and Chief Larak

V1.2 : Fixed the multiple crafting item bug when crafting you see 2 of the same armour / sword.  
 - Added Gear and Weapon to Ralof and Hadvar

V1.1 : Fixed to standalone

V1 : Added Leveled List

Have fun with new Guards, Stormcloaks and Imperials.
author: Dexterman11 and hideouscircus
